info.details:
Details
Installation

You will need a copy of the official game to run this port. Put the game files in /switch/fheroes2 (specifically ANIM, DATA, MAPS and MUSIC folders), ANIM and MUSIC folders are optional: you can play without any music or movies. If you don't have the ANIM folder, create it and copy whatever *.smk files you have from DATA to ANIM.

Controls

- Touchscreen - emulates mouse, including dragging
- L-stick - move mouse cursor
- R-stick/D-pad - scroll
- A - left mouse click
- B - Right mouse click
- X - Escape
- Y - Enter
- (+) - Cast spell
- (-) - End turn
- R - Cycle through towns
- L - Cycle through heroes

More info at https://github.com/dimag0g/fheroes2/tree/switch
